backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining chatrooms, messages, reactions, user profiles, and access control with storage mixins and admin-protected chatroom deletion.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing image‑compression and upload‑pipeline refactor requirements with associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file including routing, UI components, hooks, and styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document mounting the React app and loading the main TypeScript entry file.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app defining TanStack Router routes, layouts, 404 handling, and theme/provider setup.
frontend/src/components/AvatarPickerDial: Dialog for selecting, uploading, compressing, or removing user avatars, including Giphy search and update logic.
frontend/src/components/ChatArea.tsx: Chat UI handling message fetching, auto‑scrolling, replies, pinned video display, and message sending with media support.
frontend/src/components/ChatroomCard.tsx: Displays a chatroom card with thumbnails for YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter media, fetching previews and handling thumbnail fallbacks.
frontend/src/components/CreateChatroomDi: Modal for creating chatrooms with fields for topic, description, category, and media uploads or video/Twitter URLs.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying copyright and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: App header showing branding, back navigation, and username/avatar editing UI.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: No‑op component intentionally rendering nothing to preserve anonymous usage.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Renders individual chat messages with timestamps, reactions, media embeds, replies, and pinning controls.
frontend/src/components/MessageInput.tsx: Message composer supporting text, image upload, YouTube/Twitch/Twitter links, and voice recording.
frontend/src/components/PinnedVideo.tsx: Displays a pinned YouTube or Twitch video with an option to unpin it.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Empty placeholder file with no implemented UI.
frontend/src/components/VoiceMessagePlay: React audio player with play/pause, waveform visualization, time tracking, and synced playback control.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Returns a value that updates only after a delay for debouncing input or state changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identities, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React-query hooks for chatrooms, messages, and user data with localStorage helpers and transient result guards.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables plus custom styles for layout, dark mode, and voice message sliders.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Utility to format numbers using compact notation like k, M, and B.
frontend/src/lib/giphy.ts: Functions for searching and fetching trending GIFs from Giphy using the API key.
frontend/src/lib/html2canvasLoader.ts: Empty placeholder file for html2canvas loading logic.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Provides client-side image compression with resizing, quality control, and progress reporting, falling back to the original file if compression fails or is larger.
frontend/src/lib/twitterEmbedRenderer.ts: Empty placeholder file for future Twitter embed rendering utilities.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreview.ts: Fetches and reconstructs lightweight Twitter oEmbed previews with caching, deduped requests, and basic HTML text/image extraction.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreviewCac: Implements localStorage-based caching for Twitter oEmbed previews with validation, versioning, and expiration handling.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnail.ts: Empty placeholder file for future Twitter thumbnail utilities.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnailCache.t: Empty placeholder file for future Twitter thumbnail caching utilities.
frontend/src/lib/videoUtils.ts: Provides URL parsers and thumbnail generators for YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter, including ID extraction and embed URL helpers.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider before rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDeleteChatroomsP: Admin page with password-gated access allowing chatroom listing and deletion using backend query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/ChatroomPage.tsx: Loads a chatroom by ID, increments view count, handles loading/error states, and displays the chat interface.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Implements the lobby UI with chatroom list fetching, search, category filtering, and navigation to chatrooms using multiple query hooks.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes the project state and feature requests, mainly focused on implementing shared client‑side image compression for all upload paths.
